item.description: Present Address Centre for mathematical Plasma-Astrophysics (CmPA) KU LEUVEN Celestijnenlaan 200B, box 2400 3001 Leuven Belgium Tel. +82-10-3110-6790 E-mail: daye.lim@kuleuven.be dayelim38@gmail.com ORCiD: 0000-0001-9914-9080 Research Interests Solar Physics – MHD, Solar EUV, Solar Flares, Space Weather, Coronal Waves Stellar Physics Research Skills IDL, Solar Software Python 3, Keras Fortran 90 Observational Data Analysis of Instruments – SOHO/MDI, SDO/HMI, SDO/AIA, STEREO/EUVI Machine Learning & Deep Learning Algorithms Research Experience Doctoral Thesis
